me.lucko.helper.hologram

Interface Hologram

  • All Superinterfaces:
    GsonSerializable, Terminable

    public interface Hologram
extends Terminable, GsonSerializable
    A simple hologram utility. Should only be used from the server thread.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface me.lucko.helper.terminable.Terminable

        EMPTY

    • Method Detail

      • create

        @Nonnull
static Hologram create(@Nonnull
                                 Position position,
                                 @Nonnull
                                 List<String> lines)
        Creates and returns a new hologram

        Note: the hologram will not be spawned automatically.

        Parameters:
        position - the position of the hologram
        lines - the initial lines to display
        Returns:
        the new hologram.

      • deserialize

        static Hologram deserialize(JsonElement element)

      • spawn

        void spawn()
        Spawns the hologram

      • despawn

        void despawn()
        Despawns the hologram

      • updatePosition

        void updatePosition(@Nonnull
                    Position position)
        Updates the position of the hologram and respawns it
        Parameters:
        position - the new position

      • updateLines

        void updateLines(@Nonnull
                 List<String> lines)
        Updates the lines displayed by this hologram

        This method does not refresh the actual hologram display. spawn() must be called for these changes to apply.

        Parameters:
        lines - the new lines

      • setClickCallback

        void setClickCallback(@Nullable
                      Consumer<Player> clickCallback)
        Sets a click callback for this hologram
        Parameters:
        clickCallback - the click callback, or null to unregister any existing callback
